title: Fake Bank Login Page
description: A poorly cloned bank login page with obvious visual and technical flaws.
context: You clicked a link from an email and landed on what appears to be your bank's login page. The email said your account has been temporarily locked.

content.page_title: Bank of America - Sign In to Online Banking
content.page_html:
Bank of America

YOUR ACCOUNT HAS BEEN TEMPORARILY LOCKED

Please verify your identity to restore access.













© 2024 Bank of America Corporation

red_flags.label: URL is not the real bank domain
red_flags.detail: The real Bank of America URL is bankofamerica.com. This page is hosted on 'login-verify.net' — a completely different domain.

red_flags.label: No HTTPS encryption
red_flags.detail: The URL starts with 'http://' instead of 'https://'. Legitimate bank sites always use HTTPS with a valid certificate.

red_flags.label: Requests Social Security Number
red_flags.detail: Banks never ask for your full SSN on a login page. This is a clear attempt to steal your identity.

red_flags.label: Requests ATM/Debit card number at login
red_flags.detail: A login page should only ask for your username and password, never your card number.

red_flags.label: Account locked scare tactic
red_flags.detail: Claiming your account is locked creates panic. Real banks contact you through secure in-app messages or phone calls.

actions.label: Enter your login details and SSN
actions.feedback: Critical mistake! You would be handing your Social Security number, banking credentials, and card details directly to attackers.

actions.label: Enter fake information to test it
actions.feedback: Even entering fake info is risky — it confirms you're an active target and the site may install malware or track your browser.

actions.label: Close the page and go to bankofamerica.com directly
actions.feedback: Excellent! Always navigate to your bank by typing the URL directly. If there's a real issue with your account, you'll see it when you log in legitimately.

actions.label: Report the site as phishing and close it
actions.feedback: Great choice! Reporting helps browsers add the site to their blocklist, protecting other potential victims.

learning_objectives: Always check the URL bar — verify you're on the legitimate domain
Look for HTTPS and valid certificates on banking sites
Banks never ask for SSN or card numbers on login pages
Navigate to banking sites by typing the URL directly
Report phishing websites to help protect others
